text: Jacques Barrot (February 3, 1937 – December 3, 2014) was a French politician. He served as European Commissioner for Justice between 2008 and 2010, after having spent four years serving as Commissioner for Transport (2004–2008) and Commissioner for Regional Policy for eight months (2004). He was also a minister, and mayor of Yssingeaux. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:European Commissioners Category:French mayors Category:Government ministers of France Category:People from Haute-Loire Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
title: Jacques Barrot
